title.narrative: Fiscal Structural Program for Economic Growth
N/A
N/A
Programa Fiscal para el Crecimiento Económico

description.narrative: El objetivo general de la operacion es consolidar el programa de reforma fiscal iniciado en las primeras dos etapas del PBL programatico. El objetivo principal de la presente operacion es apoyar al pais a implementar reformas de politica en el area de dispensas tributarias y manejo de deuda en sustitucion de las medidas intermedias apoyadas por las primeras dos operaciones del prestamo programatico.

The general objective of the operation is to consolidate the fiscal reform program iniciated by the first and second loan operations of the programmatic PBL. The main goal of the present operation is to aid the country to implement policy reforms in the areas of tax-wavers and debt management in substitution of interim measures supported by the previous two operations.
